function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Respondents spending more time in nature or planning to do so","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases in outdoor environments","Mitigation":"Educating respondents about safe outdoor practices and promoting the use of protective measures like masks and hand hygiene","Technologies":"Promoting the use of outdoor spaces with proper ventilation and airflow","People":"Respondents and their families","Owner":"Public health organizations and local authorities"},{"Description":"Frequent weekend \"out of town\" trips recorded by respondents","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases between different locations","Mitigation":"Encouraging travel behavior that minimizes contact with others and promoting testing and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Digital health passports for monitoring travel history and health status","People":"Respondents and individuals in the visited locations","Owner":"Local health authorities and travel organizations"},{"Description":"Decision to buy land for agricultural purposes and real estate outside the city","Impact":"Relocation to areas with different disease prevalence and healthcare access","Mitigation":"Providing information on the healthcare infrastructure and disease prevalence in the chosen location, promoting vaccination and health services","Technologies":"Telemedicine services for remote healthcare access, GIS mapping for disease prevalence","People":"Respondents and their families","Owner":"Healthcare providers and government health agencies"}]}
